verses.text: Come, praise the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, all you the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*â€™s servants, who stand by night in the house of the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Lift your hands to the holy place, praise the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*who made heaven and earth, bless you from Zion.
